popover.primary: A mastery path focused on long range attacks with your gun
A mastery path focused on short-range combat with grenades and bombs
A mastery path focused on close combat using your deployables and gadgets

data.name: Fragmentation Grenade
data.description: You lob a grenade which shatters when it hits your enemy, dealing 725 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds to the target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them.
data.rawDescription: You lob a grenade which shatters when it hits your enemy, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} over {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS} to the target and all other enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of them.

data.name: Acid Bomb
data.description: You toss a grenade which splatters a corrosive acid everywhere. Your target and all other enemies within 20 feet of them have Corporeal resistance reduced by 236 and suffer 427 Corporeal damage over 21 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You toss a grenade which splatters a corrosive acid everywhere. Your target and all other enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of them have Corporeal resistance reduced by {COM_2_VAL0} and suffer {COM_1_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Addling Shot
data.description: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: You detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal {COM_0_VAL0}% damage to you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Increases your Armor by 660.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Armor by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Armored Plating
data.description: Everyone in your group within 100 feet takes only 80% damage for 20 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Everyone in your group within 100 feet takes only {COM_0_VAL0}% damage for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Artillery Barrage
data.description: You select a spot on the ground and call in an artillery strike for up to 4 seconds, dealing 400 damage per second to all enemies within 30 feet of that spot.
data.rawDescription: You select a spot on the ground and call in an artillery strike for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} per second to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of that spot.

data.name: Autoloader
data.description: You regain action points 30% faster for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You regain action points {COM_0_VAL0}% faster for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Dazzling Flash
data.description: When your Flashbang Grenade detonates, any enemy hit by the blast will become disoriented for 5 seconds, increasing the build times of their abilities by 50%.
data.rawDescription: When your Flashbang Grenade detonates, any enemy hit by the blast will become disoriented for {ABIL_3368_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, increasing the build times of their abilities by {ABIL_3368_COM_0_VAL0}%.

data.name: Barbed Wire
data.description: You fling coils of barbed wire all around you, rooting all enemies within 30 feet in place for 5 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.
data.rawDescription: You fling coils of barbed wire all around you, rooting all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} in place for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Blunderbuss Blast
data.description: You fire a blast of short-range pellets which deal 153 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away.
data.rawDescription: You fire a blast of short-range pellets which deal {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies in front of you, up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away.

data.name: Bolster War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted buff. Increases damage done by that siege engine by 2% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Siege Targetted buff. Increases damage done by that siege engine by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Bombardment Turret
data.description: Construct a turret with a moderate range auto-firing grenade launcher. The turret gains 100% of BS, 30% of WS, and 70% of your Wounds from item bonuses.  While within 25 feet of it you will use it to create an improvised upgrade every 2 seconds, increasing your damage by 4% to a maximum of 20%, shorten the duration and tick interval of Path of Grenadier and Tinkerer DoTs by 4% to a maximum of 35% and allow Grenadier skills to be cast while moving. You lose 4 stacks of upgrades if the turret is destroyed.
data.rawDescription: Construct a turret with a moderate range auto-firing grenade launcher. The turret gains 100% of BS, 30% of WS, and 70% of your Wounds from item bonuses.  While within {ABIL_1069_COM_1_RADI_FEET} of it you will use it to create an improvised upgrade every {ABIL_1069_COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS}, increasing your damage by {ABIL_1070_COM_0_VAL0}% to a maximum of {ABIL_1070_COM_0_VAL1}%, shorten the duration and tick interval of Path of Grenadier and Tinkerer DoTs by 4% to a maximum of 35% and allow Grenadier skills to be cast while moving. You lose 4 stacks of upgrades if the turret is destroyed.

data.name: Bugman's Best
data.description: You carefully unpack a mini-keg of rare and precious Bugman's Finest Stout with reverential awe. For the next 15 seconds, the faint vapors escaping from the keg will rejuvenate any of your groupmates within 30 feet of it, restoring 224 health every 3 seconds. You dream of the day that the brew will be aged enough to actually tap and drink.
data.rawDescription: You carefully unpack a mini-keg of rare and precious Bugman's Finest Stout with reverential awe. For the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, the faint vapors escaping from the keg will rejuvenate any of your groupmates within {COM_3_RADI_FEET} of it, restoring {COM_3_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} every {COM_2_FREQ_SECONDS}. You dream of the day that the brew will be aged enough to actually tap and drink.

data.name: Burn Salve
data.description: You distribute burn salve to groupmember's within 100 feet, increasing everyone's Elemental resistance by 157 for 60 minutes.
data.rawDescription: You distribute burn salve to groupmember's within 100 feet, increasing everyone's Elemental resistance by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_MINUTES}.

data.name: Cannon Smash
data.description: A massive cannonball smashes into your target, dealing 2400 damage  and reducing their armor by 1400 for 30 seconds.
data.rawDescription: A massive cannonball smashes into your target, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}  and reducing their armor by {COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 75 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Concussion Grenade
data.description: You lob a grenade that releases a powerful shockwave on impact, dealing 291 Corporeal damage to your target and knocking them back a short distance.  Monsters will be knocked down instead.
data.rawDescription: You lob a grenade that releases a powerful shockwave on impact, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target and knocking them back a short distance.  Monsters will be knocked down instead.

data.name: Concussive Mine
data.description: When your Land Mine detonates, any enemy hit by the blast will become disoriented for 5 seconds, increasing the build times of their abilities by 50%.
data.rawDescription: When your Land Mine detonates, any enemy hit by the blast will become disoriented for {ABIL_3368_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, increasing the build times of their abilities by {ABIL_3368_COM_0_VAL0}%.

data.name: Coordinated Fire
data.description: Signal Flare will now also cause the victim to suffer 15% more damage from all sources.
data.rawDescription: Signal Flare will now also cause the victim to suffer {ABIL_1521_COM_1_VAL0}% more damage from all sources.

data.name: Crack Shot
data.description: A well-aimed shot which deals 254 damage and disarms your target for 3 seconds, making them unable to use their weapons.
data.rawDescription: A well-aimed shot which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and disarms your target for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, making them unable to use their weapons.

data.name: Diminish War Engine
data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Decreases damage done by that siege engine to 98% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Siege Targetted debuff. Decreases damage done by that siege engine to {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Electromagnet
data.description:
You set up a device which unleashes a powerful wave of force, pulling up to six enemy players within 75 feet inwards towards it and knocking down monsters. 1 second later, the device blasts outwards and snares all enemies within 30 feet, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 4 seconds.
The attack uses the Ranged statistic.
data.rawDescription:
You set up a device which unleashes a powerful wave of force, pulling up to six enemy players within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} inwards towards it and knocking down monsters. 1 second later, the device blasts outwards and snares all enemies within {COM_3_RADI_FEET}, reducing their movement speed by {COM_3_VAL0}% for {COM_3_DURA_SECONDS}.
The attack uses the Ranged statistic.

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.
data.rawDescription: Your cast times are reduced to {COM_0_VAL0}% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.
data.rawDescription:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Extra Ammo
data.description: When you construct a turret, it will restore 20 Action Points to everyone within 30 feet every 2 seconds.
data.rawDescription: When you construct a turret, it will restore {ABIL_1069_COM_2_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS} to everyone within {ABIL_1069_COM_2_RADI_FEET} every {ABIL_1069_COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS}.

data.name: Extra Powder
data.description: Acid Bomb and Fragmentation Grenade gain a 50% increase to the size of their areas of effect.
data.rawDescription: Acid Bomb and Fragmentation Grenade gain a 50% increase to the size of their areas of effect.

data.name: Fightin' Chance
data.description: Increases your Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Weapon Skill by 120, but reduces your Toughness by 120.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Strength, Ballistic Skill, and Weapon Skill by {COM_0_VAL0}, but reduces your Toughness by {COM_1_VAL0}.

data.name: Firebomb
data.description: You toss a grenade filled with flaming pitch which deals 266 Corporeal damage to your target.
data.rawDescription: You toss a grenade filled with flaming pitch which deals {COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to your target.

data.name: Flak Jacket
data.description: You don an experimental suit of protective gear, increasing your Armor by 560 for up to 1 hours.
data.rawDescription: You don an experimental suit of protective gear, increasing your Armor by {COM_0_VAL0} for up to {COM_0_DURA_HOURS}.

data.name: Flame Turret
data.description: Construct a turret with a short range self-firing flamethrower. The turret gains 100% of BS, 10% of WS, and 90% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within 25 feet of it you will use it to create an improvised upgrade every 2 seconds, increasing your damage by 4% to a maximum of 20%, Dodge and Disrupt by 4% to a maximum of 32%, the radius of your AoE abilities by 6.25% to a maximum of 50% but reduce your cast range by 5% to a minimum of 60%. You lose 4 stacks of upgrades if the turret is destroyed.
data.rawDescription: Construct a turret with a short range self-firing flamethrower. The turret gains 100% of BS, 10% of WS, and 90% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within {ABIL_1069_COM_1_RADI_FEET} of it you will use it to create an improvised upgrade every {ABIL_1069_COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS}, increasing your damage by {ABIL_1070_COM_0_VAL0}% to a maximum of {ABIL_1070_COM_0_VAL1}%, Dodge and Disrupt by 4% to a maximum of 32%, the radius of your AoE abilities by 6.25% to a maximum of 50% but reduce your cast range by 5% to a minimum of 60%. You lose 4 stacks of upgrades if the turret is destroyed.

data.name: Flashbang Grenade
data.description: You toss a grenade which explodes with a burst of force, dealing 291 Corporeal damage to the target.  The blinding flash interrupts the victim and all enemies within 20 feet of them.
data.rawDescription: You toss a grenade which explodes with a burst of force, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to the target.  The blinding flash interrupts the victim and all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of them.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Fling Explosives
data.description: You fling packets of explosives all around you for up to 4 seconds, dealing 400 damage each second to all enemies within 30 feet.
data.rawDescription: You fling packets of explosives all around you for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} each second to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Focused Fire
data.description: You focus all of your shots on your enemy for up to 3 seconds, dealing 219 damage to them every second. This effect will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription: You focus all of your shots on your enemy for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to them every second. This effect will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Friction Burn
data.description:
A powerful swipe with your spanner which smacks all enemies in front of you up to 40 feet away, dealing 462 Corporeal damage over 9 seconds.
The attack uses the Ranged statistic.
data.rawDescription:
A powerful swipe with your spanner which smacks all enemies in front of you up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.
The attack uses the Ranged statistic.

data.name: Gun Blast
data.description: A gun attack which deals 387 damage to your enemy.
data.rawDescription: A gun attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy.

data.name: Gun Turret
data.description: Construct a turret with a long range self-aiming gun. The turret gains 75% of BS and WS from item bonuses and 50% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within 25 feet of it you will use it to create an improvised upgrade every 2 seconds, increasing your damage by 4% to a maximum of 20% and increase your range by 5% to a maximum of 25% extra range. You lose 4 stacks of upgrades if the turret is destroyed.
data.rawDescription: Construct a turret with a long range self-aiming gun. The turret gains 75% of BS and WS from item bonuses and 50% of your Wounds from item bonuses. While within {ABIL_1069_COM_1_RADI_FEET} of it you will use it to create an improvised upgrade every {ABIL_1069_COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS}, increasing your damage by {ABIL_1070_COM_0_VAL0}% to a maximum of {ABIL_1070_COM_0_VAL1}% and increase your range by 5% to a maximum of 25% extra range. You lose 4 stacks of upgrades if the turret is destroyed.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.
data.rawDescription: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every {COM_1_FREQ_SECONDS} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, hitting all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of that area for {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.note: Not usable on Siege Rams or Oil
data.description: Siege Targetted debuff. Increases the cooldown times of that siege engine by 50% for 10 seconds
data.rawDescription: Siege Targetted debuff. Increases the cooldown times of that siege engine by {COM_0_VAL0}% for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}

data.description: Increases your autoattack speed by 50% when using a gun.
data.rawDescription: Increases your autoattack speed by {COM_0_VAL1}% when using a gun.

data.name: Hip Shot
data.description: A quick shot from the hip which deals 216 damage.  This attack may be used at close range.
data.rawDescription: A quick shot from the hip which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.  This attack may be used at close range.

data.name: Hollow-Points
data.description: Snipe and Gun Blast will now deal an additional 370 damage over 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Snipe and Gun Blast will now deal an additional {ABIL_3838_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {ABIL_3838_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Incendiary Rounds
data.description: You fire bullets that burst into flame when they strike the enemy, dealing 860 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You fire bullets that burst into flame when they strike the enemy, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Land Mine
data.description: You fling out a land mine which arms itself immediately and persists for up to 1 minutes.  The mine will detonate when an enemy gets too close, dealing 243 damage to all enemies within 30 feet and staggering them for up to 5 seconds, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.
data.rawDescription: You fling out a land mine which arms itself immediately and persists for up to {COM_0_DURA_MINUTES}.  The mine will detonate when an enemy gets too close, dealing {ABIL_31_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} and staggering them for up to {ABIL_31_COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, preventing all actions unless they are damaged.

data.name: Lightning Rod
data.description: You deploy a shock rod at your feet which will remain for up to 9 seconds and periodically blast out with waves of power, dealing 229 Corporeal damage every 3 seconds to all enemies within 30 feet of it.
data.rawDescription: You deploy a shock rod at your feet which will remain for up to {COM_4_DURA_SECONDS} and periodically blast out with waves of power, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} every {COM_0_FREQ_SECONDS} to all enemies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} of it.

data.name: Masterful Aim
data.description: Increases your Ballistic Skill by 160.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Ballistic Skill by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Napalm Grenade
data.description:
You toss a grenade packed full of dangerous napalm gel on to the ground, where it will burst open and burn for 30 seconds, causing damaging every 2 seconds to any enemies who come within 20 feet of that spot. The fires increase in intensity over time, causing 79 Corporeal damage during the first 10 seconds, 146 Corporeal damage for the next 10 seconds, and 212 Corporeal damage for the final 10 seconds.
If there are multiple Napalm Grenades in the same area only the highest level one will deal damage.
data.rawDescription:
You toss a grenade packed full of dangerous napalm gel on to the ground, where it will burst open and burn for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, causing damaging every {COM_2_FREQ_SECONDS} to any enemies who come within {COM_3_RADI_FEET} of that spot. The fires increase in intensity over time, causing {COM_3_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} during the first {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, {COM_5_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} for the next {COM_4_DURA_SECONDS}, and {COM_7_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} for the final {COM_6_DURA_SECONDS}.
If there are multiple Napalm Grenades in the same area only the highest level one will deal damage.

data.name: Phosphorous Shells
data.description: A barrage of mortar attacks which continuously fire at a spot on the ground that you select for up to 6 seconds, dealing 265 Corporeal damage every 2 seconds to all enemies within 20 feet of that spot, and snares them by 20%.  This requires careful aim, and if hit you'll lose .5 seconds from the channel.
data.rawDescription: A barrage of mortar attacks which continuously fire at a spot on the ground that you select for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} every 2 seconds to all enemies within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} of that spot, and snares them by 20%.  This requires careful aim, and if hit you'll lose .5 seconds from the channel.

data.name: Pierce Defenses
data.description: If an enemy blocks, dodges, or parries any of your attacks, their chances to block, dodge, and parry will be reduced by 15% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: If an enemy blocks, dodges, or parries any of your attacks, their chances to block, dodge, and parry will be reduced by {ABIL_3880_COM_0_VAL0}% for {ABIL_3880_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Point-Blank
data.description: A mid-range attack that deals 600 damage and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.
data.rawDescription: A mid-range attack that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocks the targeted player away. Monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Proximity Alarm
data.description: Increases the chance for you and your groupmates to detect hidden enemies by 50% while you or your group are within 20 feet feet of your turret.
data.rawDescription: Increases the chance for you and your groupmates to detect hidden enemies by {COM_1_VAL1}% while you or your group are within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} feet of your turret.

data.name: Quick Reloader
data.description: Gun Blast and Snipe now builds up 1 seconds faster.
data.rawDescription: Gun Blast and Snipe now builds up {COM_0_VAL0_SECONDS} faster.

data.name: Redeploy
data.description: You activate your Turret's automatic redeployment mechanism, instantly moving it to your current location.
data.rawDescription: You activate your Turret's automatic redeployment mechanism, instantly moving it to your current location.

data.name: Reinforced Casing
data.description: Adds 160 Wounds to your turrets.
data.rawDescription: Adds {COM_0_VAL0} Wounds to your turrets.

data.name: Scattershot
data.description: You release a string of several gun blasts in a row for up to 4 seconds, dealing 400 damage each second to all enemies in front of you, up to 40 feet away.
data.rawDescription: You release a string of several gun blasts in a row for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} each second to all enemies in front of you, up to {COM_1_RADI_FEET} away.

data.name: Self-Destruct
data.description: You activate the self-destruct mechanism built into your turret, destroying the turret and dealing 370 Corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet of it, knocking them down for 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You activate the self-destruct mechanism built into your turret, destroying the turret and dealing {COM_1_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of it, knocking them down for {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Field Repair
data.description: You focus on repairing your turret for up to 3 seconds, restoring 674 health to it every second and making it briefly immune to damage. This effect will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.
data.rawDescription: You focus on repairing your turret for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, restoring {COM_0_VAL0_HEALTH} to it every second and making it briefly immune to damage. This effect will end if you lose your concentration or run out of action points.

data.name: Signal Flare
data.description: You mark the enemy with a bright signal flare, dealing 1225 damage over 21 seconds and reducing their chances to dodge or block attacks by 5%.
data.rawDescription: You mark the enemy with a bright signal flare, dealing {COM_2_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS} and reducing their chances to dodge or block attacks by {COM_0_VAL0}%.

data.description: A slow but powerful gun shot which deals 538 damage to your enemy and cannot be defended against.
data.rawDescription: A slow but powerful gun shot which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your enemy and cannot be defended against.

data.name: Spanner Swipe
data.description:
You clobber your enemy with your spanner, dealing 228 damage and reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.
The attack uses the Ranged statistic.
data.rawDescription:
You clobber your enemy with your spanner, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reducing their run speed by {COM_1_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Static Discharge
data.description: You quickly trigger one of your many gadgets and release a sudden shockwave, dealing 146 Corporeal damage to all enemies within 30 feet.
data.rawDescription: You quickly trigger one of your many gadgets and release a sudden shockwave, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Sticky Bomb
data.description: A packet of explosives which sticks to your target and slowly burns, dealing 432 Corporeal damage over 15 seconds.  If the effect runs for its full course or the target is killed, then a concealed inner package of explosives will suddenly detonate, dealing 183 Corporeal damage to the victim and all enemies within 20 feet of them.
data.rawDescription: A packet of explosives which sticks to your target and slowly burns, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_CORPOREALDAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  If the effect runs for its full course or the target is killed, then a concealed inner package of explosives will suddenly detonate, dealing {ABIL_3211_COM_0_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to the victim and all enemies within {ABIL_3211_COM_1_RADI_FEET} of them.

data.name: Stopping Power
data.description: Hip Shot now will knock the victim back a short distance.
data.rawDescription: Hip Shot now will knock the victim back a short distance.

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from Stuns and Knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.
data.rawDescription: You recover from Stuns and Knockdowns {COM_0_VAL1}% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Strafing Run
data.description: You call for air support, signaling for a strafing run which deals 403 damage to all enemies in a line in front of you, up to 65 feet away.  Any enemy players hit by the powerful shells will be sent flying away from you, while monsters will be knocked down.
data.rawDescription: You call for air support, signaling for a strafing run which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies in a line in front of you, up to {COM_0_RADI_FEET} away.  Any enemy players hit by the powerful shells will be sent flying away from you, while monsters will be knocked down.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Increases your Corporeal resistance by 252.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Corporeal resistance by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: Tangling Wire
data.description: After ending or being removed, Barbed Wire will now Snare targets by 40% and deal 246 damage over 5 seconds.
data.rawDescription: After ending or being removed, Barbed Wire will now Snare targets by {ABIL_3468_COM_1_VAL0}% and deal {ABIL_3468_COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {ABIL_3468_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Throwing Arm
data.description: Increases the ranges of all Path of the Grenadier abilities by 25%.
data.rawDescription: Increases the ranges of all Path of the Grenadier abilities by {COM_0_VAL1}%.

data.name: Tracer Rounds
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% as long as you are within 100 feet of your turret.
data.rawDescription: Increases your chance to critically hit by {COM_0_VAL1}% as long as you are within 100 feet of your turret.

data.name: Trench Fighting
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.
data.rawDescription: Your damage is increased by {COM_1_VAL0}% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Well-Oiled Machine
data.description: You can now construct your turrets instantly and the cost of Redeploy is reduced to 0 Action Points.
data.rawDescription: You can now construct your turrets instantly and the cost of Redeploy is reduced to 0 Action Points.

data.name: Armor-piercing Rounds
data.description: You load your rifle with the finest of rounds, your attacks will ignore 25% the victim's armor for the next 12 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You load your rifle with the finest of rounds, your attacks will ignore 25% the victim's armor for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Mortar Round
data.description: You fire a mortar at your target, dealing 300 damage to them and everyone within 20 feet every second for 4 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You fire a mortar at your target, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to them and everyone within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} every second for 4 seconds.
